issues.description: The StockIngredient class constructor signature in the template repository (String, int, int, boolean) does not match the problem statement and the solution, both of which expect a three-parameter constructor StockIngredient(String, int, int). As a result, students following the spec cannot call new StockIngredient(name, price, quantity) and will face compilation errors.
issues.suggested_fix: In the template repository, add an overloaded constructor StockIngredient(String name, int price, int quantity) that delegates to the existing constructor (e.g. passing a default strictValidation value), or adjust the template’s constructor signature to remove the strictValidation parameter so it matches the three-parameter form specified in the problem statement.
